attributes.action: Free Fat Greg from female oppression.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fat Greg's chick won't let him come boarding with the boys in March. 
We petition the PM to order her, upon pain of spam, to allow him to fulfil his GOAT desires.
 We ask that the PM authorises NHS funds to pay for plastic reconstructive surgery, which will remove the thumbprint on his forehead.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
